thread.title: Jember Fashion Carnival 2015 Extravaganza : OutframeTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Jember Fashion Carnival 2015 Extravaganza : OutframeTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Jember Fashion Carnival 2015 Extravaganza : Outframe Published on : Wednesday, August 26, 2015
The spectacular Jember Fashion Carnival (JFC) extravaganza will again take center stage this year when it rolls out the carpet in the charming town of Jember in East Java Province, from 23rd to 25th August 2015.
Centered at the Central Park Jember, this year this exceptional fashion fiesta comes with the main theme “Outframe” which is interpreted as opening opportunities to create something unconventional out of the common frame. Alongside the Carnival, JFC2015 will also be highlighted with an Exhibition, and a Conference at the Aston Hotel.
Well known for presenting creative and spectacular designs, this year’s carnival features 10 outstanding sub-themes, namely:Majapahit, Ikebana, Fossil, Parrot, Circle, Pegasus, Lionfish, Egypt, Melanesia, and Reog. The Carnival this year will also feature a special Kid’s Carnival on 27th August 2015 participated by no less than 450 children ranging from the ages between 4.5 years to 12 years old.
Having started in 2003 as a local event by fashion designer Dynand Fariz, he transformed the fashion show into a Carnival, to start off with in celebration of the anniversary of the town of Jember. Since then, JFC has grown into one of Indonesia s largest and most prestigious Carnivals. With main orientation on global fashion trends wrapped in Indonesian cultural heritage, the Carnival has increased its success year by year, receiving rising media coverage and praise from Indonesian television and press as well as from the overseas press.
Meanwhile hotels in and around the town of Jember are filled with domestic and international tourists.”90% of hotel rooms are occupied” said the head of the Tourism and Cultural Office of Jember, Sandi Suwardi, reported tempo.co. Sandi explained that the tourists began arriving in Jember since Tuesday, 25th August. He also estimated that from 28th to 30th August all hotels in Jember will report full house.
Especially in conjunction with JFC2015, Garuda Indonesia Airline will also add extra flights from Jember on 31st August 2015 to carry home travelling Jember fashion enthusiasts, since attendance this year is expected to be exc eptionally high.
Source:-Tourism Indonesia
